graph_title: Number of pupils per computer in general education schools
indicator_name: Number of pupils per computer in general education schools
national_indicator_description: The ratio of the number of pupils in secondary schools per one computer
computation_definitions: Secondary school - a type of educational institution implementing basic general education programs with advanced teaching of one or more general, including stream or separate subjects.
computation_calculations: The ratio of secondary school pupils to the number of computers allocated to schools.
source_organisation_2: Ministry of Education, Science, Culture and Sport of RA
